channel.title: Baldwin County|Alabama|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Baldwin County|Alabama|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 30 Offramp at US-90/US-98
item.description: I-10 West - Exit 30 Offramp at US-90/US-98 - Battleship Parkway. Turn left for US-90/US-98 West to USS Alabama Memorial Park/Vietnam and Korean Veterans Memorial. Turn left for US-90/US-98 East/To US-31.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 38
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 38 - US-90/US-98/Daphne - Fairhope/Spanish Fort.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 38
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 38 - AL-181/Spanish Fort/Daphne/Malbis Plantation Parkway.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 44
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 44 - AL-59/Loxley/Bay Minette.

item.title: I-10 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-10 west. Distance to Loxley and Mobile.

item.title: Baldwin Beach Express North at I-10 West
item.description: Baldwin Beach Express North at I-10 West to Mobile.

item.title: Baldwin Beach Express North at I-10
item.description: Baldwin Beach Express North at I-10 in Baldwin County. Use I-10 east for Pensacola (Florida); I-10 west for Mobile.

item.title: Baldwin Beach Express North at US-90
item.description: Baldwin Beach Express North at US-90 in Baldwin County.

item.title: Baldwin Beach Express North at Sliver Hill Ave.
item.description: Baldwin Beach Express North at Sliver Hill Ave. Use Silver Hill Ave. west for AL-104 and Robertsdale.

item.title: AL-180 East at Foley Beach Express
item.description: AL-180 East at Foley Beach Express. Use Foley Beach Express for access to I-10 and I-65.

item.title: AL-180 East/To Foley Beach Express
item.description: AL-180 East/To Foley Beach Express in Gulf Shores.

item.title: AL-180 East at Dolphin Ave.
item.description: AL-180 East at Dolphin Ave. Turn left for AL-59.

item.title: AL-182 East Approaching Gulf State Park Entrance
item.description: AL-182 East Approaching Gulf State Park Entrance. Continue straight for AL-182 to the Pier.

item.title: AL-182 West at AL-161
item.description: AL-182 West at AL-161 - Signal 12B.

item.title: AL-182 West at AL-161 (To AL-180) - Orange Beach
item.description: AL-182 West at AL-161 North (To AL-180) in Orange Beach. Turn right on AL-160 for Foley and The Wharf.

item.title: AL-182 West - Signal 13
item.description: Signal 13 on AL-182 west in Orange Beach. The stop lights in Orange Beach are signed with the signal number and their milepost number. When multiple signals occur within a milepost, letters in alphabetical order are appended to the milepost.

item.title: AL-182 West - Continue Straight for I-10 and Foley
item.description: AL-182 West - Continue Straight for I-10 and Foley via Toll Bridge (and AL-161).

item.title: AL-182 West - Orange Beach
item.description: AL-182 West in Orange Beach

item.title: AL-182 West - Welcome To Alabama
item.description: Welcome To Alabama on AL-182 West in Orange Beach.

item.title: End AL-59 South at AL-182
item.description: End AL-59 South at AL-182 in Gulf Shores.

item.title: End AL-59 South at AL-182
item.description: End AL-59 South at AL-182 in Gulf Shores.

item.title: AL-180 West at AL-59
item.description: AL-180 West at AL-59 in Gulf Shores. Use AL-59 North for Foley; AL-59 south for Gulf Beaches. Continue west on AL-180 for Fort Morgan.

item.title: AL-180 West to AL-59 - Gulf Shores
item.description: AL-180 West to AL-59 in Gulf Shores

item.title: AL-180 East - Gulf Shores
item.description: AL-180 east in Gulf Shores.

item.title: AL-135 North - Speed Limit 26
item.description: Speed Limit 26 on AL-135 North - Gulf State Park.

item.title: AL-59 South at US-98 - Foley
item.description: AL-59 South at US-98 in Foley. Use US-98 East for the Foley Beach Express. US-98 is the Coastal Connection Scenic Byway.

item.title: AL-59 South at Foley Beach Express
item.description: AL-59 South at Foley Beach Express to Orange Beach. Continue south on AL-59 for Foley.

item.title: AL-59 South at AL-104/CH-83 - Robertsdale
item.description: AL-59 South at AL-104/CH-83 in Robertsdale. Turn right for AL-104 West to Silverhill; left for CR-83.

item.title: US-90 East/AL-59 South at US-90/AL-59 Split
item.description: US-90 East/AL-59 South at US-90/AL-59 Split in Robertsdale. Turn left to continue east on US-90.

item.title: US-90 East/AL-59 South at US-90/AL-59 Split
item.description: US-90 East/AL-59 South at US-90/AL-59 Split in Robertsdale. Use US-90 East for Pensacola (Florida). Continue south on AL-59 for Robertsdale and Gulf Shores.

item.title: AL-59 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on AL-59 south. Distance to Loxley, Foley, Gulf Shores, and Orange Beach.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 44 Offramp
item.description: I-10 East - Exit 44 Offramp at AL-59. Turn right on AL-59 North to I-65.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 44 Offramp
item.description: I-10 East - Exit 44 offramp. Turn right on AL-59 for Loxley, Gulf Shores, Orange Beach, and Gulf State Park.

item.description: I-10 east approaching Exit 44 - AL-59/Loxley/Bay Minette.
